SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Belt
Interrelated interfaces for expressing flow-controlled processing pipelines, where Sinks accept elements and Sources yield elements.
Belt.Segue<In,Out>
A Sink paired with a Source.
Belt.Sink<In>
A Stage that accepts input elements.
Belt.SinkOperator<In,Out>
Represents an operation on a downstream Sink that produces an upstream Sink.
Belt.SinkStepSource<In,Out>
A Segue where the source is a StepSource.
Belt.SinkToStepOperator<In,Out>
Represents an operation on a downstream StepSink that produces an upstream Sink.
Belt.Source<Out>
A Stage that yields output elements.
Belt.SourceOperator<In,Out>
Represents an operation on an upstream Source that produces a downstream Source.
Belt.SourceToStepOperator<In,Out>
Represents an operation on an upstream Source that produces a downstream StepSource.
Belt.Stage
Sealed interface over Source, Sink, and Station.
Belt.Station
A Stage that represents connected Source and Sink stages.
Belt.StepSegue<In,Out>
A Segue where the sink is a StepSink and the source is a StepSource.
Belt.StepSink<In>
A Sink that can accept input elements one at a time.
Belt.StepSinkOperator<In,Out>
Represents an operation on a downstream StepSink that produces an upstream StepSink.
Belt.StepSinkSource<In,Out>
A Segue where the sink is a StepSink.
Belt.StepSource<Out>
A Source that can yield output elements one at a time.
Belt.StepSourceOperator<In,Out>
Represents an operation on an upstream StepSource that produces a downstream StepSource.
Belt.StepToSinkOperator<In,Out>
Represents an operation on a downstream Sink that produces an upstream StepSink.
Belt.StepToSourceOperator<In,Out>
Represents an operation on an upstream StepSource that produces a downstream Source.
Belts
Implementations of various useful Stages, Segues, and Operators.
DeadlineSegue<In,Out>
A StepSegue that uses deadlines to manage timed waits for pushes and pulls, and provides several lifecycle hooks to simplify state management.
DeadlineSegue.SinkController
A controller for sink-like operations on a DeadlineSegue.
DeadlineSegue.SourceController<Out>
A controller for source-like operations on a DeadlineSegue.
FailureHandlingScopePREVIEW
Preview.
A StructuredTaskScope that handles exceptions from failed tasks by delegating to a handler.
Gatherer<T,A,R>
This is a crude shim of the "Gatherer" API proposed in JEP-461.
Gatherer.Downstream<R>
 
Gatherer.Integrator<A,T,R>
 
ProxySink<In>
A Sink that runs and completes downstream sinks when run or completed (normally or abruptly), respectively.
ProxySource<Out>
A Source that runs and closes upstream sources when run or closed, respectively.
UpstreamException
Exception thrown when attempting to yield an element from a boundary Source whose linked boundary Sink has completed abruptly.
